content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command from you to upgrade the "duolingo" package, but it was already installed. Recently, you executed a shell command which returned a warning about running pip as the \'root\' user and notified of a new release of pip. You also sent a command to execute a python file called "language_learning.py". Command analyze_code returned suggestions to add error handling and use a try-except block in case the request fails. Command execute_python_file returned an error regarding the \'duolingo\' module having no attribute \'Duolingo\'. You then sent a command to search for \'duolingo API changes\' on Google. Command google returned a list of websites related to Duolingo API changes, and you requested to browse the website https://github.com/KartikTalwar/Duolingo to check for any changes that might be causing the error.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The given text provides information about an unofficial Duolingo API written in Python, including various methods to retrieve information. However, there is no information about checking for changes to the API that might be causing an error. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://github.com/KartikTalwar/Duolingo#start-of-content)', '\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://github.com/)', '\\n            Sign\\xa0up\\n           (https://github.com/signup?ref_cta=Sign+up&ref_loc=header+logged+out&ref_page=%2F%3Cuser-name%3E%2F%3Crepo-name%3E&source=header-repo)', '\\n\\n\\n\\n\\nActions\\n        Automate any workflow\\n      \\n (https://github.com/features/actions)', '\\n\\n\\n\\n\\nPackages\\n        Host and manage packages\\n      \\n (https://github.com/features/packages)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Google Translate API"}}}'}]
